definition: to open up/to spread/sheet of paper/classifier for flat objects, sheet/classifier for votes
capacity/quantity/amount/to estimate/abbr. for 量詞|量词[liang4 ci2], classifier (in Chinese grammar)/measure word

sentences.english: We have dealt with effective conductivity tensor of the composites with local anisotropic components.
sentences.chinese: 我們計算了定域各向異性材料的有效電導率張量。

sentences.english: There are many great applications of the tensor analysis in survey with the magnetotelluric sounding method.
sentences.chinese: 張量分析在大地電磁測深法勘探中有許多重要的應用。

sentences.english: Finally, the essential commutant of tensor product of operator algebras is discussed.
sentences.chinese: 最後討論了張量積代數的本性換位。

sentences.english: We obtained also come results for rank of tensor product matrices.
sentences.chinese: 本文還得到了關於張量積矩陣積的某些結果。

sentences.english: This decomposition may give another definition of high order tensor's covariant derivative.
sentences.chinese: 這種分解可以給出高階張量協變導數的另一種定義。

sentences.english: The contraction may be applied to products of components, which have tensor character.
sentences.chinese: 縮並可以用於具有張量性質的分量之積。

sentences.english: Tensor algebra is tied to coordinates .
sentences.chinese: 張量代數則離不開座標系。

sentences.english: A release rate tensor of damage strain energy is derived.
sentences.chinese: 推導出損傷應變能釋放率張量。

sentences.english: The diagonal inertia tensor of mass relative to the center of mass.
sentences.chinese: 相對於重心的質量的慣性張量對角線。

sentences.english: An Isometry on Tensor Product of C~*-Algebras;
sentences.chinese: 縮並可以用於具有張量性質的分量之積。

sentences.english: In addition, the spheric tensor illustrates better angular dependence of the density function.
sentences.chinese: 而且，球張量更能反映密度函數的角分佈特性。

sentences.english: Furthermore, the semi module of fractions is represented as the extension of scalars, which is defined by a tensor product.
sentences.chinese: 證明了分式半模可用純量的擴張，即張量積來表示。

sentences.english: Vacuum solutions of conformally covariant equation for symmetric tensor field are discussed.
sentences.chinese: 本文討論了對稱張量場共形協變方程的真空解。

sentences.english: The fourth -rank tensors contain the compliance and stiffness constants.
sentences.chinese: 四秩張量包含柔量常數和剛度常數。

sentences.english: The decomposition of impedance tensors is a effective method developed in recent years.
sentences.chinese: 阻抗張量分解就是近幾年發展起來的一種有效的方法。

sentences.english: Quantities like stresses are called tensors of rank 2.
sentences.chinese: 類似於壓力的量稱爲2階的張量。
